name: Astro4x
description:
A Single Player Turn-Based 4X Strategy Indie Game.

In this calm, thoughtfully designed turn-based single player game, you take
control of a space-faring empire, fighting against an ai opponent. You decide
what starships are built, and where those ships move, leading to a variety of
offensive and defensive strategies. Each player has a home station, which
functions as a base to build units at - but also serves as the 'flag' for the
opponent. If you home station is captured by the enemy, you lose the game.
Likewise, your goal is to capture the enemies home station, winning the game.

Gameplay is similar to chess. Games take between 5-30 minutes to play.
